level.heading: EFFECT ON EXISTING EMPLOYMENT BENEFITS (ยง 7-3214) The provisions of the Act do not alter the obligation of an employer to complyith any collective bargaining agreement or any employment benefit or plan thatrovides paid leave rights greater than those established by the Act. Subject to the provisions of section 13 of the Act and ยง 3216 of this Chapter, written bona fide collective bargaining agreement shall not waive the paideave requirements of the Act and this Chapter, unless such collectiveargaining agreement provides at least three (3) paid days of leave.
